text:
@Scaramucci My Texas dad loves Trump Loooooves him

He knows about the lies.  The terrible virus response

My Texas sister caught Coronavirus & her hospital/doctor had all sorts of trouble w/med supplies, etc. while Trump admin was lying on TV that everyone was just fine

Dad doesn't care 🤷‍♀️
